This third floor, NEWLY RENOVATED, 2BR WATERFRONT Condo (on the Newfound River right in the heart of beautiful Bristol NH) available on 01-January is looking for a great tenant to appreciate and care for it. This location is only about 6 miles from Route 93/Exit 23 and is easily commutable to Plymouth, Franklin, Tilton, Meredith, Laconia and perhaps even Concord and beyond. Rent INCLUDES: heat, hot water, sewer, dumpster and off-street parking. This newly renovated third floor condo is situated in a updated brick building which features tile floors and includes a modern fire annunciator system. 1 year lease required, small pets negotiable and persons on Social Security or Disability are WELCOME. This unit features new hardwood floors in the bedrooms, tile in the kitchen, and a new fridge with and Ice and Water dispenser in the door! Please note: The rent is $1099/mo but you will receive a $60/month discount for paying your rent within 5 days of the 1st of the month, resulting in a $1039 monthly rental. First month's rent + one month security deposit required. Also: We would be happy to rent this unit to a PSU student but the co-signature of a parent (who lives in NH) with solid financial wherewithal will be required. A good credit score, employment history and some cash cushion (savings) will be required but these requirements will be waived if you have guaranteed income and have a good rental history (or if you can come up with a financially solid co-signer who lives in NH)... You will not find a finer waterfront home at a more reasonable rent anywhere in New Hampshire. We are QUALITY, responsible and good natured landlords looking for a long-term QUALITY, responsible and good natured tenant(s)!  NO DOGS weighing more than 15 pounds will be considered. This is mandated by our Condo Association so PLEASE DO NOT ASK FOR AN EXCEPTION

If youâre on the hunt for a modern apartment with historic flair, look no further than the brand new Colony Mill apartments in Keene! Constructed in the mid-1700s, this iconic landmark was once a cornerstone for the textile industry in Cheshire County, and today it is home to 89 beautifully renovated loft apartments that offer the perfect blend of modern convenience and old world charm.   This stunning iconic mill has original details like atriums, floor to ceiling windows, architectural features, original hardwood floors throughout and so much more. Each apartment at Colony Mill has a sleek, modern kitchen with granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, in-unit washer/dryer, central A/C and ample closet space. If youâre on the hunt for a modern apartment with historic flair, look no further than the brand new Colony Mill apartments in Keene! Constructed in the mid-1700s, this iconic landmark was once a cornerstone for the textile industry in Cheshire County, and today it is home to 89 beautifully renovated loft apartments that offer the perfect blend of modern convenience and old world charm.   This stunning iconic mill has original details like atriums, floor to ceiling windows, architectural features, original hardwood floors throughout and so much more. Each apartment at Colony Mill has a sleek, modern kitchen with granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, in-unit washer/dryer, central A/C and ample closet space. Many units also feature original hardwood flooring and floor-to-ceiling windows that provide scenic views of our cobblestone courtyard, downtown Keene and panoramic mountain views.   Colony Mill also offers a variety of onsite amenities, including fully equipped fitness center, game room, theatre room, and a Wifi Lounge. Enjoy the nightlife? Recently updated cozy home in a quiet safe HOA neighborhood close to all the amenities amidst the NH lake country. 2 floors with a 2 car garage and heated storage on the ground level under the living area. Both bathrooms are full bathrooms with a shower or tub, sink, and toilet. A spacious kitchen (with recently upgraded wood floors) and pantry room are adjacent to the dining area which faces the back deck through a sliding glass door. Kitchen includes stove, refrigerator/freezer, and full size dishwasher. The dining area looks out to the large back yard (not fenced) and into green space behind and on both sides of the home. The home is suitable for a couple or small family and has plenty of storage space.  The home sits up on a small hill from the street offering good privacy from the street. The heat is oil burner and the water is conditioned. The HOA plows the community roads. Heat oil, electricity, garbage, snow removal, and yard care are the tenants responsibility. If youâre on the hunt for a modern apartment with historic flair, look no further than the brand new Colony Mill apartments in Keene! If youâre on the hunt for a modern apartment with historic flair, look no further than the brand new Colony Mill apartments in Keene! Constructed in the mid-1700s, this iconic landmark was once a cornerstone for the textile industry in Cheshire County, and today it is home to 89 beautifully renovated loft apartments that offer the perfect blend of modern convenience and old world charm.    This stunning iconic mill has original details like atriums, floor to ceiling windows, architectural features, original hardwood floors throughout and so much more. If you do not receive rent assistance, rent is $800. Security Deposit is $800. We welcome families with limited incomes and Section 8 Housing Choice Voucher (HCV) holders. Rent varies if you receive assistance from the HCV program-please inquire.    2 Bedroom units are rented to households of 2 or more. Live-in aid may count as household member-please inquire.   Completed applications are reviewed for eligibility on a first come-first serve basis. If an initial review indicates you may be eligible, you will be put on the wait list. If the first available unit is filled by another applicant, your completed application will be kept on file for the wait list. You may ask to be removed from the list at any time.  Income restrictions to qualify: Minimum Gross Income to rent this 2 Bedroom: $25,000 for all Household (HH) sizes (n/a for HCV holders) Maximum Gross Income:  for 2 person HH $39700 for 3 person HH $44650 for a 4 person HH $49600 for a 5 person HH $53600 for a 6 person HH $57550  Criminal background checks, references, rental history, and all income and assets are documented and required. Please leave a message with your general questions and we will get back to you.  We do not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, familial status, disability, sexual orientation, age, marital status, or religion.

$500 security deposit with your good credit on all one and two bedroom apartments!!! If youâre on the hunt for a modern apartment with historic flair, look no further than the brand new Colony Mill apartments in Keene! Constructed in the mid-1700s, this iconic landmark was once a cornerstone for the textile industry in Cheshire County, and today it is home to 89 beautifully renovated loft apartments that offer the perfect blend of modern convenience and old world charm.   This stunning iconic mill has original details like atriums, floor to ceiling windows, architectural features, original hardwood floors throughout and so much more. Each apartment at Colony Mill has a sleek, modern kitchen with granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, in-unit washer/dryer, central A/C and ample closet space. Many units also feature original hardwood flooring and floor-to-ceiling windows that provide scenic views of our cobblestone courtyard, downtown Keene and panoramic mountain views.   Colony Mill also offers a variety of onsite amenities, including fully equipped fitness center, game room, theatre room, and a Wifi Lounge. Enjoy the nightlife? Residents have direct onsite access to Elm City Brewing Company, NBT Bank, and the Keene Casino.  All this without leaving the convenience of your parking lot.  We are pet friendly community, contact us for complete details on our pet policy.  Owned and professionally managed by Brady Sullivan Properties. If youâre on the hunt for a modern apartment with historic flair, look no further than the brand new Colony Mill apartments in Keene! Constructed in the mid-1700s, this iconic landmark was once a cornerstone for the textile industry in Cheshire County, and today it is home to 89 beautifully renovated loft apartments that offer the perfect blend of modern convenience and old world charm.   This stunning iconic mill has original details like atriums, floor to ceiling windows, architectural features, original hardwood floors throughout and so much more. Each apartment at Colony Mill has a sleek, modern kitchen with granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, in-unit washer/dryer, central A/C and ample closet space. Many units also feature original hardwood flooring and floor-to-ceiling windows that provide scenic views of our cobblestone courtyard, downtown Keene and panoramic mountain views.   Colony Mill also offers a variety of onsite amenities, including fully equipped fitness center, game room, theatre room, and a Wifi Lounge. Enjoy the nightlife? Residents have direct onsite access to Elm City Brewing Company, NBT Bank, and the Keene Casino.  All this without leaving the convenience of your parking lot. We have two studio apartments. Both are on the ground floor. One is ready to go  the other will be ready shortly. They will rent for around $950 a month. Rent includes heat and hot water. Let us know if any of these are of interest.   Our studios are basically one room units with a full bath. They generally measure 12 x 25. You get a full size bath room with a tub shower and vanity. The main âliving Areaâ has a smaller Kitchen area and the living room section would measure about 12 x 14. Itâs not a bad set as far as studios go. They are modern and up to date,. One was redone 5 years a go and the other is getting new cabinets installed this week. You get a full size fridge and stove.   We do all the usual screening for prospective tenants. Application, Credit check and back ground checks and income guideline. We want to see credit 650 or better, good landlord references and an income around $33,000 a year or better. As far as pets go one cat may be possible but we donât accept anything else. No dogs, rabbits ferrets etc etc etc. We have tight parking, especially in the winter as a result we only allow one car per apartment.

1 bedroom, 1 bath (with Shower/Bath) offers an open floor plan, and wood floors in the living room. On the first floor, you will find a tiled kitchen with granite countertops and stainless steel appliances including Stove with microwave hood, Dishwasher, and Refrigerator. The living room has hardwood floors and wide slat blind window treatments. On the second floor are an office, tiled bath with shower/tub, carpeted bedroom with a large walk-in closet.  The bedroom is large enough to accommodate a king bed, chest of drawers and bureau   Rent includes 1 designated, off-street, plowed, parking spot, snow removal, lawn care.  The tenant is required to remove snow from walkways.  The location offers easy commute to So. Maine, Dover, Portsmouth, and Rochester. Cable and internet available.  A washer/dryer hookup is available in a common basement area.   Heat is oil-fired hot air and hot water is electric.  Rent is $925.00. Available January 15th. One year lease is required. May be able to accommodate occupancy after January 1st, please inquire.  Dogs accepted with certain breed restrictions for a nominal monthly fee if well behaved and the landlord has met. Credit check reference required. The landlord is local and takes good care of the unit.  When replying to the ad, please include the following information about yourself, all occupants of the unit, your salary and salary for each adult in the unit, how long you have been at your current job, your rental history and expected move-in date. The maximum number of animals is 1. Please be specific as to pets including the breed of dogs. Please understand that we typically receive 75 - 100 responses to an ad for our units and though we respond to all, we cannot schedule showings for all so please provide the information requested.  IMPORTANT: When responding please ensure that the ad title is the subject of the response as we may have more than one property available and we won't know which one you're responding to.  Also because all emails from CL go into junk mail, we sort by subject line and move the Ad responses to a separate folder.  If you change the subject line, your email will likely remain in junk mail with no response.

We are offering a $500 security deposit with your good credit!!!!  If youâre on the hunt for a modern apartment with historic flair, look no further than the brand new Colony Mill apartments in Keene! Constructed in the mid-1700s, this iconic landmark was once a cornerstone for the textile industry in Cheshire County, and today it is home to 89 beautifully renovated loft apartments that offer the perfect blend of modern convenience and old world charm.    This stunning iconic mill has original details like atriums, floor to ceiling windows, architectural features, original hardwood floors throughout and so much more. Each apartment at Colony Mill has a sleek, modern kitchen with granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, in-unit washer/dryer, central A/C and ample closet space. Many units also feature original hardwood flooring and floor-to-ceiling windows that provide scenic views of our cobblestone courtyard, downtown Keene and panoramic mountain views.    Colony Mill also offers a variety of onsite amenities, including fully equipped fitness center, game room, theatre room, and a Wifi Lounge.  Enjoy the nightlife? Residents have direct onsite access to Elm City Brewing Company, NBT Bank, and the Keene Casino.  All this without leaving the convenience of your parking lot. If youâre on the hunt for a modern apartment with historic flair, look no further than the brand new Colony Mill apartments in Keene! Constructed in the mid-1700s, this iconic landmark was once a cornerstone for the textile industry in Cheshire County, and today it is home to 89 beautifully renovated loft apartments that offer the perfect blend of modern convenience and old world charm.   This stunning iconic mill has original details like atriums, floor to ceiling windows, architectural features, original hardwood floors throughout and so much more. Each apartment at Colony Mill has a sleek, modern kitchen with granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, in-unit washer/dryer, central A/C and ample closet space. Many units also feature original hardwood flooring and floor-to-ceiling windows that provide scenic views of our cobblestone courtyard, downtown Keene and panoramic mountain views.   Colony Mill also offers a variety of onsite amenities, including fully equipped fitness center, game room, theatre room, and a Wifi Lounge. Enjoy the nightlife? Residents have direct onsite access to Elm City Brewing Company, NBT Bank, and the Keene Casino.  All this without leaving the convenience of your parking lot. Pretty 1,620 square foot 3 bedroom/2 bath single family expanded ranch in nice residential neighborhood diagonally across from the East Rochester elementary school.   12 minutes to Route 16 and easy access to Dover and Portsmouth or Points North.  First level offers wood floors, large living room with a beautiful fireplace and bay window, nicely appointed tiled kitchen with dishwasher and disposal and separate breakfast area and lots of storage. The first level has a master bedroom with wood floors and double closet and 2 additional bedrooms with carpet and good size closets; one with ceiling fan. There is a large bath with rain forest shower head.   Lower level is finished with recessed lighting, tile floors, wood beams, brick backed pellet stove (think cost savings in the winter months!), pretty half bath, and a washer/dryer is included.  The lower level offers a great spot for a playroom and/or office and casual living room.   Large and level fenced in back yard with deck and room for a garden.  A shed for all your toys and a  paved driveway big enough for three cars as needed.  Dogs are welcomed (breed restrictions) at small fee.  Heated with oil  along with the pellet stove.  Landlord pays water, and sewer.  Landlord is local and is responsive. Gorgeous open concept, cathedral ceiling reverse floor plan, 4 bedroom house with water views all over. Located in South Eliot. 2 miles to Kittery Foreside and 2.5 miles to Downtown Portsmouth, off Exit 1, 95. Perfect for a family.  Features:  The house has an open concept reverse floor plan to take advantage of the water views. The great room has vaulted ceilings, exposed beams and sliding glass doors to one of the decks. Maple hardwood flooring throughout the space. There is a large kitchen with a rounded peninsula. The kitchen has 4 windows looking out towards the water. There is a large pantry and a cooktop on the peninsula.  The master bedroom suite is down from the main space and kitchen area on the second floor. The bathroom features a 2-person Jacuzzi tub and heated floors. The bedroom has a sliding glass door that opens to a second deck.  The first floor has a bonus open space next to the entrance, 3 bedrooms, and a bathroom with washer and dryer and large accessible shower. 2 bedrooms have bamboo flooring, the third one is carpeted.  The house also has a 2 car attached garage with automatic door openers. The yard is landscaped, with beautiful flower beds and has 4 raised beds for growing your own organic edible garden in the summer. Pets considered on a case by case basis.  Available January 15. Credit and background check needed.

Looking for a nice place to live right downtown with lots of space?  Take a look at this beautiful turn of the century gem that is one house lot from Elm Street!  Right in the heart of everything downtown Manchester has to offer. A two to three minute walk to campus of MCPHS. SNHU is very close by too for new students/professionals moving to the area. If you are not from NH, downtown Manchester, (which is all within walking distance) is really the hot spot not only for the city, but the state as well. The Verizon center can be walked to, as well as all the restaurants /bars/clubs the downtown life has to offer. The house is on the same street as our newly expanded Currier Art Museum. There are many parks in the area for relaxing or running.  Fit Lab Gym, is just two blocks away on Dow Street.   This beautiful 1st floor 3 bedroom has everything. It has been recently updated and repainted. Inside you'll find three bedrooms with hardwood floors. There is a large eat-in kitchen with tin ceilings and crown molding, and a separate dedicated laundry room with HE washer and dryer. Huge 16 by 16 foot living room, as well as a farmers porch off the back door. There is plenty of room for everything. If you need additional storage, there is a dry basement in which the apartment has direct access to.  For being in the city we have a nice little yard, great for BBQs in the summertime. On site parking for 2 cars, free residential parking on street, and the landlord owns a parking lot up the street for additional parking.  Washer and dryer, is included with apartment.   Rent $1,450 a month, $1,450 deposit, Separate Utilities. No Smoking. No Pets. Credit/background/references will be checked.  Available Jan 1st, 2020.  For students/roommates coming together for new school term for 2020, I can include all utilities (heat, hot-water, electric, water/sewer, recycling and trash pick up) and Internet for an additional charge. All living expenses covered with one check, so you can focus on you studies and not worry about bills.    As the owner, I used to live in this building, the neighbors in this building are either students or professionals, truly great people. All the residents are committed to recycling and there is a great sense of community within the house.

This ALL-INCLUSIVE, Studio Waterfront Condo (right off Exit 27 in Campton) available on 15-November is looking for a great tenant to appreciate and care for it. This location is only about 3 miles from PSU! Rent INCLUDES: heat, hot water, 95 channels of HD DirectTV, ELECTRICITY, WiFi, water/sewer, trash removal along with all groundskeeping, landscaping and snow plowing. This second floor unit features: a modern fire sprinkler system along with a large, screened/enclosed porch overlooking the Pemigewasset River. 1 year lease required, small pets negotiable and persons on Social Security, Disability or Housing Vouchers are WELCOME. Please note: The rent is $859/mo but you will receive a $50/month discount for paying your rent within 5 days of the 1st of the month, resulting in a $809 monthly rental. First month's rent + one month security deposit +$200 DirectTV satellite box deposit + a $100 mailbox key deposit will be required, but the DirectTV box deposit can be waived if you do not want the TV service and the mailbox deposit can also be waived if you do not want to receive mail at the property. Also: We would be happy to rent this unit to a PSU student but the co-signature of a parent (who lives in NH) with solid financial wherewithal will be required. A good credit score, employment history and some cash cushion (savings) will be required but these requirements will be waived if you have guaranteed income and have a good rental history (or if you can come up with a financially solid co-signer who lives in NH).. You will not find a finer waterfront studio home at a more reasonable ALL-INCLUSIVE rent anywhere in New Hampshire We are QUALITY, responsible and good natured landlords looking for a long-term QUALITY, responsible and good natured tenant!  Note: This is a one room STUDIO unit with all utilities included so we will allow at most TWO people to live in this unit... Thanks in advance for your understanding!!! This third floor, NEWLY RENNOVATED, 2BR WATERFRONT Condo (on the Newfound River right in the heart of beautiful Bristol NH) available on 15-November is looking for a great tenant to appreciate and care for it. This location is only about 6 miles from Route 93/Exit 23 and is easily commutable to Plymouth, Franklin, Tilton, Meredith, Laconia and perhaps even Concord. Rent INCLUDES: heat, hot water, sewer, dumpster and off-street parking. This newly renovated third floor condo is situated in a updated brick building which features tile floors and includes a modern fire annunciator system. 1 year lease required, small pets negotiable and persons on Social Security or Disability are WELCOME.  This unit features new hardwood floors in the bedrooms, tile in the kitchen, and a new fridge with and Ice and Water dispenser in the door!  Please note: The rent is $1099/mo but you will receive a $60/month discount for paying your rent within 5 days of the 1st of the month, resulting in a $1039 monthly rental. First month's rent + one month security deposit required. Also: We would be happy to rent this unit to a PSU student but the co-signature of a parent (who lives in NH) with solid financial wherewithal will be required. A good credit score, employment history and some cash cushion (savings) will be required but these requirements will be waived if you have guaranteed income and have a good rental history (or if you can come up with a financially solid co-signer who lives in NH).. You will not find a finer waterfront home at a more reasonable rent anywhere in New Hampshire. We are QUALITY, responsible and good natured landlords looking for a long-term QUALITY, responsible and good natured tenant(s)!  NO DOGS weighing more than 15 pounds will be considered. This is mandated by our Condo Association so PLEASE DO NOT ASK FOR AN EXCEPTION.

Partially furnished, modern and high-end loft townhouse with one car garage and another adjacent off-street designated spot for the unit. It's a radiant heat which actually also helps to add moisture into the air in the bone dry winters. High-end appliances, and too many features to list!! Sustainably built and designed by a Scandinavian builder. Minimum 6 months but one year preferred. 23 Vernon St APT 1, Manchester, NH 03101

2 bed, 1.5 bath, 1020 sq ft, half-finished basement, washer/dryer, frig, electric stove and storage. Front yard and fenced off backyard with 2 car off-street parking asking $1,350.00/mo. Utilities are NOT included, this is a pet friendly. Accepting applications, please email me for further details. Thank you.  115 Taylor St, Manchester, NH 03103

Quarrywood Green features 2 bedroom/2 bathroom luxury condos for lease located in a serene country setting just minutes from Nashua. The unit is on the 22nd Floor. Heating and Hot water incl. On premise washer/Dryer.  Pet-Friendly with document and monthly fees. Private parking lot with permit.There are income and credit requirements. We take applications now. Showing by appointment.  Please email for application pkg and further information. check out videos at our facebook @quarrywoodgreen. Actual unit may differ from pictures shown.
